title: WTB: 19th Century Hall of Fame cards

posts.post_title: WTB: 19th Century Hall of Fame cards
posts.post_content:
All:

I am looking to acquire the following players in low grade.  

Old Hoss Radbourn
Ed Delahanty

For Radbourn, am interested in either his Old Judge or Buchner Gold Coin card.  For Delahanty,  am looking for either his Old Judge, 1895 Mayo Cut or Sporting News Supplements card.  

Please let me know (via private message) if you're interested in selling.  Thank you.

posts.post_title: WTB: 19th Century Hall of Fame cards
posts.post_content: BUMP.  I'm still looking.  Thank you.
